module.name: ap210_connection_zone_based_model_extraction
module.keywords: module, electrical, connection area, simulation model, network analysis, configuration management, design management

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of connection zone based model extraction. This data provides information sufficient to allow communication of more detailed connection points of analysis models than is available using feature assignment to analytical model ports. Configuration management information and design management information is provided.

inscope.li: network analysis models based on connection areas;
items within the scope of AP210_product_data_management_arm;
items within the scope of Characteristic_arm.

outscope.li: network analysis models based on terminals only
